hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Install dependencies export WORK_DIR=`pwd` sudo apt-get -y update sudo apt-get install -y wget tar openjdk-8-jdk ant curl
# Download Apache Solr 7.2.1 source code wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/lucene/solr/7.2.1/solr-7.2.1-src.tgz tar zxvf solr-7.2.1-src.tgz
# Set Environment Variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version export ANT_OPTS="-Xmx1024m -Xss1g"
# Configure and make ant -version cd $WORK_DIR/solr-7.2.1/solr ant ivy-bootstrap ant compile ant server
#verification step cd $WORK_DIR/solr-7.2.1/solr/bin sudo chmod a+x solr ls -l
./solr start echo "Started"
./solr create -c samp2 | tee solr_output.txt cat solr_output.txt
curl http://localhost:8983/solr/
#verification of output string="Created new core 'samp2'"; if grep -i "$string" solr_output.txt; then ./solr stop else exit 1 fi
./solr version | grep 7.2.1
